StatDef.label: pregnancy speed
StatDef.description: Changes how quickly a pawn's pregnancy progresses. The higher this value, the less time a pregnancy lasts. A pregnancy speed of 1 is normal speed, while a speed of 10 would cause the pregnancy to progress 10 times faster.

StatDef.label: bloodloss recovery bonus
StatDef.description: Alters how quickly pawns recover from bloodloss. At 0%, the pawn recovers blood at the normal rate, while at 100% the pawn recovers from bloodloss twice as fast as normal.

StatDef.label: healthiness
StatDef.description: Alters how much maximum health this can pawn have. This should act as an additional multiplier to whatever other health changing things the pawn has, like life stage.

StatDef.label: deathrest rise rate
StatDef.description: Changes the rate that a pawn's deathrest need recovers. The higher this value, faster it goes. This should stack with deathrest efficiency.

StatDef.label: deathrest fall rate
StatDef.description: Changes the rate that a pawn requires deathrest. The higher this value, the more often they need to deathrest.

StatDef.label: deathrest efficiency
StatDef.description: Changes the rate that a pawn progresses through deathrest. Higher values mean the minimum time a pawn needs to deathrest to avoid a debuff is decreased.

StatDef.label: kill satiety rate
StatDef.description: Alters how long it takes for a pawn to reach peak murderous tendencies. The higher this is, the more often the pawn must kill pawns to remain happy.

StatDef.label: comfort rise rate
StatDef.description: Alters how long it takes for a pawn to reach their current comfort limit. This only takes effect if the current level is below the target level.

StatDef.label: comfort fall rate
StatDef.description: Alters how long it takes for a pawn to reach their current comfort limit. This only takes effect if the current level is above the target level.

StatDef.label: beauty rise rate
StatDef.description: Alters how long it takes for a pawn to reach their current beauty limit. This only takes effect if the current level is below the target level.

StatDef.label: beauty fall rate
StatDef.description: Alters how long it takes for a pawn to reach their current beauty limit. This only takes effect if the current level is above the target level.

StatDef.label: mood rise rate
StatDef.description: Alters how long it takes for a pawn to reach their current mood limit. This only takes effect if the current level is below the target level.

StatDef.label: mood fall rate
StatDef.description: Alters how long it takes for a pawn to reach their current mood limit. This only takes effect if the current level is above the target level.

StatDef.label: recreation rise rate
StatDef.description: Alters how much this pawn gains from recreational activities.

StatDef.label: growth point rate
StatDef.description: Multiplies how quickly this pawn gains growth points. The higher this multiplier is, the greater the effects of things like growth vats and high learning values.

StatDef.label: outgoing damage factor
StatDef.description: A multiplier on all outgoing damage.

StatDef.label: psyfocus fall rate offset
StatDef.description: An offset on the psyfocus change rate. This takes effect before psyfocus fall rate factor, and when negative it can cause the pawn to regenerate focus without meditating, assuming its value is low enough.

StatDef.label: psyfocus fall rate factor
StatDef.description: A multiplier on the psyfocus change rate. This takes effect after psyfocus fall rate offset.

StatDef.label: maximum hemogen offset
StatDef.description: An offset on maximum hemogen, with a value of 200% allowing pawns to store 300 hemogen instead of 100. This is added before the maximum hemogen multiplier takes effect.

StatDef.label: maximum hemogen multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier on maximum hemogen, with a value of 200% allowing pawns to store 200 hemogen instead of 100. This also multiplies the maximum hemogen offset when applicable.
